ws.rocket.config.section.write

Interface SectionWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeanConstructorWriter, BeanConstructPropertyWriter, MultiPropertyWriter, SimplePropertyWriter

    public interface SectionWriter
    A section writer determines how the data collected by section reader is to be written to target beam. It's the bridge between section reader and bean writer.

    Due to the binding role, section writers should implement validation to verify that supported collection type is returned by section readers, and that the targeted properties in the bean exists (and are with correct type).

    Author:
    Martti Tamm

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void describeTo(StreamWriter out, Class<?> collectionType, Class<?> valueType)
      Enables the section writer to describe the expected section data.
      void validate(Class<?> collectionType, Class<?> mainValueType, BeanValidator validator)
      Performs simple checks to verify that this writer accepts the collection and main value types from the reader, and that the targeted properties are writable.
      void write(BeanWriter<?> writer, Object values, Class<?> mainValueType)
      Writes given values to target bean using given writer.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        void validate(Class<?> collectionType,
            Class<?> mainValueType,
            BeanValidator validator)
        Performs simple checks to verify that this writer accepts the collection and main value types from the reader, and that the targeted properties are writable. When a problem is detected, it's recommended to throw a ModelException.
        Parameters:
        collectionType - The collection type used by the reader.
        mainValueType - The main value type in the collection. For a map, it's the type of the map keys.
        validator - A helper for validating the bean properties.

      • write

        void write(BeanWriter<?> writer,
         Object values,
         Class<?> mainValueType)
        Writes given values to target bean using given writer.
        Parameters:
        writer - A helper for writing to the bean properties.
        values - A collection with collected values.
        mainValueType - The main value type in the collection (it is used to determine array component type). For a map, it's the type of the map keys (to check if they are Strings).

      • describeTo

        void describeTo(StreamWriter out,
              Class<?> collectionType,
              Class<?> valueType)
        Enables the section writer to describe the expected section data.
        Parameters:
        out - An object where to write the information.
        collectionType - The collection type used by the reader.
        valueType - The main value type in the collection (it is used to determine array component type). For a map, it's the type of the map keys (to check if they are Strings).
